src.search_api.bm25_index#

Module for search_api.bm25_index.

NavMap: - NavMap: Structure describing a module navmap. - toks: Tokenise text into lowercase alphanumeric terms. - BM25Doc: Container storing fields required for BM25 scoring. - BM25Index: Construct, persist, and query a BM25 index.
